zero:
@[simp]
theorem zero : is_symmetric (0 : mv_polynomial σ R) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).zero_mem
#align zero zero
support_esymm'':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem support_esymm'' (n : ℕ) [decidable_eq σ] [nontrivial R] :
    (esymm σ R n).support =
      (powerset_len n (univ : Finset σ)).bUnion fun t =>
        (finsupp.single
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t
              (finsupp.single i 1))
            (1 : R)).support :=
  by
  rw [esymm_eq_sum_monomial]
  simp only [← single_eq_monomial]
  convert finsupp.support_sum_eq_bUnion (powerset_len n (univ : Finset σ)) _
  intro s t hst
  rw [Finset.disjoint_left]
  simp only [finsupp.support_single_ne_zero _ one_ne_zero, mem_singleton]
  rintro a h rfl
  have := congr_arg finsupp.support h
  rw [finsupp.support_sum_eq_bUnion, finsupp.support_sum_eq_bUnion] at this
  · simp only [finsupp.support_single_ne_zero _ one_ne_zero, bUnion_singleton_eq_self] at this
    exact absurd this hst.symm
  all_goals intro x y; simp [finsupp.support_single_disjoint]
#align support_esymm'' support_esymm''
support_esymm':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem support_esymm' (n : ℕ) [decidable_eq σ] [nontrivial R] :
    (esymm σ R n).support =
      (powerset_len n (univ : Finset σ)).bUnion fun t =>
        {finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t
            (finsupp.single i 1)} :=
  by
  rw [support_esymm'']
  congr
  funext
  exact finsupp.support_single_ne_zero _ one_ne_zero
#align support_esymm' support_esymm'
support_esymm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem support_esymm (n : ℕ) [decidable_eq σ] [nontrivial R] :
    (esymm σ R n).support =
      (powerset_len n (univ : Finset σ)).image fun t =>
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t
          (finsupp.single i 1) :=
  by
  rw [support_esymm']
  exact bUnion_singleton
#align support_esymm support_esymm
sub:
theorem sub (hφ : is_symmetric φ) (hψ : is_symmetric ψ) : is_symmetric (φ - ψ) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).sub_mem hφ hψ
#align sub sub
smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem smul (r : R) (hφ : is_symmetric φ) : is_symmetric («expr • » r φ) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).smul_mem hφ r
#align smul smul
rename_esymm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ » -/
theorem rename_esymm (n : ℕ) (e : «expr ≃ » σ τ) : rename e (esymm σ R n) = esymm τ R n :=
  calc
    rename e (esymm σ R n) =
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
          (powerset_len n univ)
          (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" x
            (X (e i))) :=
      by simp_rw [esymm, map_sum, map_prod, rename_X]
    _ =
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
          (powerset_len n (univ.map e.to_embedding))
          (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" t (X i)) :=
      by simp [finset.powerset_len_map, -finset.map_univ_equiv]
    _ =
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
          (powerset_len n univ)
          (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" t (X i)) :=
      by rw [finset.map_univ_equiv]
    
#align rename_esymm rename_esymm
one:
@[simp]
theorem one : is_symmetric (1 : mv_polynomial σ R) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).one_mem
#align one one
neg:
theorem neg (hφ : is_symmetric φ) : is_symmetric (-φ) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).neg_mem hφ
#align neg neg
mul:
theorem mul (hφ : is_symmetric φ) (hψ : is_symmetric ψ) : is_symmetric (φ * ψ) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).mul_mem hφ hψ
#align mul mul
mem_symmetric_subalgebra:
@[simp]
theorem mem_symmetric_subalgebra [CommSemiring R] (p : mv_polynomial σ R) :
    p ∈ symmetric_subalgebra σ R ↔ p.is_symmetric :=
  iff.rfl
#align mem_symmetric_subalgebra mem_symmetric_subalgebra
map_esymm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
theorem map_esymm (n : ℕ) (f : «expr →+* » R S) : map f (esymm σ R n) = esymm σ S n := by
  simp_rw [esymm, map_sum, map_prod, map_X]
#align map_esymm map_esymm
map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
@[simp]
theorem map (hφ : is_symmetric φ) (f : «expr →+* » R S) : is_symmetric (map f φ) := fun e => by rw [← map_rename, hφ]
#align map map
esymm_zero:
@[simp]
theorem esymm_zero : esymm σ R 0 = 1 := by simp only [esymm, powerset_len_zero, sum_singleton, prod_empty]
#align esymm_zero esymm_zero
esymm_map_val:
/-
Copyright (c) 2020 Hanting Zhang. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Hanting Zhang, Johan Commelin
-/
theorem _root_.finset.esymm_map_val {σ} (f : σ → R) (s : Finset σ) (n : ℕ) :
    (s.val.map f).esymm n = (s.powerset_len n).sum fun t => t.prod f := by
  simpa only [esymm, powerset_len_map, ← finset.map_val_val_powerset_len, map_map]
#align finset.esymm_map_val finset.esymm_map_val
esymm_is_symmetric:
theorem esymm_is_symmetric (n : ℕ) : is_symmetric (esymm σ R n) :=
  by
  intro
  rw [rename_esymm]
#align esymm_is_symmetric esymm_is_symmetric
esymm_eq_sum_subtype:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
/-- We can define `esymm σ R n` by summing over a subtype instead of over `powerset_len`. -/
theorem esymm_eq_sum_subtype (n : ℕ) :
    esymm σ R n =
      finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
        (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod"
          (t : Finset σ) (X i)) :=
  sum_subtype _ (fun _ => mem_powerset_len_univ_iff) _
#align esymm_eq_sum_subtype esymm_eq_sum_subtype
esymm_eq_sum_monomial:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/-- We can define `esymm σ R n` as a sum over explicit monomials -/
theorem esymm_eq_sum_monomial (n : ℕ) :
    esymm σ R n =
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
        (powerset_len n univ)
        (monomial
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t
            (finsupp.single i 1))
          1) :=
  by
  simp_rw [monomial_sum_one]
  rfl
#align esymm_eq_sum_monomial esymm_eq_sum_monomial
esymm_eq_multiset_esymm:
/-- The `n`th elementary symmetric `mv_polynomial σ R` is obtained by evaluating the
`n`th elementary symmetric at the `multiset` of the monomials -/
theorem esymm_eq_multiset_esymm : esymm σ R = (finset.univ.val.map X).esymm :=
  funext fun n => (finset.univ.esymm_map_val X n).symm
#align esymm_eq_multiset_esymm esymm_eq_multiset_esymm
degrees_esymm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem degrees_esymm [nontrivial R] (n : ℕ) (hpos : 0 < n) (hn : n ≤ fintype.card σ) :
    (esymm σ R n).degrees = (univ : Finset σ).val := by
  classical
    have :
      (finsupp.to_multiset ∘ fun t : Finset σ =>
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" t
            (finsupp.single i 1)) =
        finset.val :=
      by
      funext
      simp [finsupp.to_multiset_sum_single]
    rw [degrees, support_esymm, sup_finset_image, this, ← comp_sup_eq_sup_comp]
    · obtain ⟨k, rfl⟩ := nat.exists_eq_succ_of_ne_zero hpos.ne'
      simpa using powerset_len_sup _ _ (nat.lt_of_succ_le hn)
    · intros
      simp only [union_val, sup_eq_union]
      congr
    · rfl
#align degrees_esymm degrees_esymm
aeval_esymm_eq_multiset_esymm:
theorem aeval_esymm_eq_multiset_esymm [algebra R S] (f : σ → S) (n : ℕ) :
    aeval f (esymm σ R n) = (finset.univ.val.map f).esymm n := by
  simp_rw [esymm, aeval_sum, aeval_prod, aeval_X, esymm_map_val]
#align aeval_esymm_eq_multiset_esymm aeval_esymm_eq_multiset_esymm
add:
theorem add (hφ : is_symmetric φ) (hψ : is_symmetric ψ) : is_symmetric (φ + ψ) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).add_mem hφ hψ
#align add add
C:
@[simp]
theorem C (r : R) : is_symmetric (C r : mv_polynomial σ R) :=
  (symmetric_subalgebra σ R).algebra_map_mem r
#align C C
